component:components/t-add~TAddComponent.title: TAddComponent
component:components/t-add~TAddComponent.text: Transformicon Add component. PUBLIC - Optional parameters:  animation string - Set the add animation type. a string - Shorthand alias for animation. is-added boolean - Set initial open added state. onclick closure action - The name of your consuming application's component/controller/route action to handle the transformicon click. Returned with 1 parameter isAdded, which is a boolean type indicating if the current state is pending add.  Available animation types:  minus check  Examples:  {{! These are functionally equivalent}} {{t-add}} {{t-add a='minus'}} {{t-add animation='minus'}} {{t-add is-added=false animation='minus'}}

attributes.name: TAddComponent
attributes.description:
Transformicon Add component.

PUBLIC - Optional parameters:

  • animation string - Set the add animation type.
  • a string - Shorthand alias for animation.
  • is-added boolean - Set initial open added state.
  • onclick closure action - The name of your consuming application's component/controller/route action to handle the transformicon click. Returned with 1 parameter isAdded, which is a boolean type indicating if the current state is pending add.

Available animation types:

  • minus
  • check

Examples:

    {{! These are functionally equivalent}}

    {{t-add}}
    {{t-add a='minus'}}
    {{t-add animation='minus'}}
    {{t-add is-added=false animation='minus'}}

fields.name: animationType
fields.description: Get the CSS classname corresponding to the component's current animation type.

fields.name: isAdded
fields.description: Get the classname representing the added toggled state for the add icon. This classname is stored in the BaseTransformiconComponent.

component:components/t-form~TFormCompone.title: TFormComponent
component:components/t-form~TFormCompone.text: Transformicon Form component. PUBLIC - Optional parameters:  is-searching boolean - Set initial searching state. onclick closure action - The name of your consuming application's component/controller/route action to handle the transformicon click. Returned with 1 parameter isSearching, which is a boolean type indicating if the current state is searching or not searching.  Examples:  {{! These are functionally equivalent}} {{t-form}} {{t-form is-searching=false}}

attributes.name: TFormComponent
attributes.description:
Transformicon Form component.

PUBLIC - Optional parameters:

  • is-searching boolean - Set initial searching state.
  • onclick closure action - The name of your consuming application's component/controller/route action to handle the transformicon click. Returned with 1 parameter isSearching, which is a boolean type indicating if the current state is searching or not searching.

Examples:

    {{! These are functionally equivalent}}

    {{t-form}}
    {{t-form is-searching=false}}

fields.name: isSearching
fields.description: Get the classname representing the searching toggled state for the video icon. This classname is stored in the BaseTransformiconComponent.

component:components/t-grid~TGridCompone.title: TGridComponent
component:components/t-grid~TGridCompone.text: Transformicon Grid component. PUBLIC - Optional parameters:  animation string - Set the grid animation type. a string - Shorthand alias for animation. is-open boolean - Set initial open grid state. onclick closure action - The name of your consuming application's component/controller/route action to handle the transformicon click. Returned with 1 parameter isOpen, which is a boolean type indicating if the current state is open or closed.  Available animation types:  rearrange collapse  Examples:  {{! These are functionally equivalent}} {{t-grid}} {{t-grid a='rearrange'}} {{t-grid animation='rearrange'}} {{t-grid is-open=false animation='rearrange'}}

attributes.name: TGridComponent
attributes.description:
Transformicon Grid component.

PUBLIC - Optional parameters:

  • animation string - Set the grid animation type.

  • onclick closure action - The name of your consuming application's component/controller/route action to handle the transformicon click. Returned with 1 parameter isOpen, which is a boolean type indicating if the current state is open or closed.

Available animation types:

  • collapse

Examples:

Available animation types:  butterfly minus x-cross arrow-up arrow-360-left arrow-left  Examples:  {{! PUBLIC - Optional parameters:  animation string - Set the menu animation type. a string - Shorthand alias for animation. is-removed boolean - Set initial open removed state. onclick closure action - The name of your consuming application's component/controller/route action to handle the transformicon click. Available animation types:  check chevron-left chevron-right chevron-down chevron-up  Examples:  {{! Returned with 1 parameter isPlaying, which is a boolean type indicating if the current state is playing or stopped.  Examples:  {{! These are functionally equivalent}} {{t-video}} {{t-video is-playing=false}}

template:application-tailwind.text: Your Tailwind styles A reference for every generated class in your app.

template:docs/index.title: Overview
template:docs/index.text: Overview Use Transformicon components in your Ember applications! Installation ember install ember-transformicons

template:docs/transformicons/add.title: Add Transformicon
template:docs/transformicons/add.text: Add Transformicon API and Examples Add optional parameters: is-added boolean - Set initial open add state. onclick closure action - The name of your consuming application's component/controller/route action to handle the transformicon click. Returned with 1 parameter isAdded, which is a boolean type indicating if the current state is pending add. animation {{t-add}} {{t-add animation="minus"}} {{t-add a="check"}} {{t-add}} {{t-add a="minus"}} {{t-add a="check"}} is-added {{t-add is-added=true}} {{t-add is-added=someBoundProperty}} {{t-add is-added=true}} onclick action {{t-add is-added=isAdded onclick=(action "updateAddAction")}} isAdded =

template:docs/transformicons/form.title: Form Transformicon
template:docs/transformicons/form.text: Form Transformicon API and Examples Form optional parameters: is-searching boolean - Set initial searching state. onclick closure action - The name of your consuming application's component/controller/route action to handle the transformicon click. Returned with 1 parameter isSearching, which is a boolean type indicating if the current state is searching or not searching. animation {{t-form}} is-searching {{t-form is-searching=false}} {{t-form is-searching=someBoundProperty}} {{t-form is-searching=true}} onclick action {{t-form is-searching=isSearching onclick=(action "updateFormAction")}} isSearching =

template:docs/transformicons/grid.title: Grid Transformicon
template:docs/transformicons/grid.text: Grid Transformicon API and Examples Grid optional parameters: is-open boolean - Set initial open grid state. onclick closure action - The name of your consuming application's component/controller/route action to handle the transformicon click. Returned with 1 parameter isOpen, which is a boolean type indicating if the current state is open or closed. animation {{t-grid}} {{t-grid animation="rearrange"}} {{t-grid a="collapse"}} {{t-grid}} {{t-grid a="rearrange"}} {{t-grid a="collapse"}} is-open {{t-grid is-open=true}} {{t-grid is-open=someBoundProperty}} {{t-grid is-open=true}} onclick action {{t-grid is-open=isGridOpen onclick=(action "updateGridAction")}} isGridOpen =

template:docs/transformicons/index.title: Transformicons
template:docs/transformicons/index.text: Transformicons Component API Add your favorite Transformicon component to any template in your Ember application. Global optional parameters: animation string - Set the menu animation type. If you do not provide a specific type for an icon category, then a default type will simply be provided for you. Aliases: a Components

template:docs/transformicons/loader.text: Loader Transformicon API and Examples animation {{t-loader}}

Returned with 1 parameter isOpen, which is a boolean type indicating if the current state is open or closed. animation {{t-mail}} is-open {{t-mail is-open=false}} {{t-mail is-open=someBoundProperty}} {{t-mail is-open=false}} onclick action {{t-mail is-open=hasUnreadMail onclick=(action "updateMailAction")}} hasUnreadMail =

template:index.title: Introduction
template:index.text: Introduction Transformicons markup is built with accessibility in mind. Since not all screen readers know what aria-label is yet we've chosen to include important text in a .tcon-visuallyhidden span using the HTML5 Boilerplate method that is screen reader friendly. What is a transformicon? It's an animated symbol/button/icon that morphs. Get started
